entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -12.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Big Trout Lake Airport 12:00 AM CDT Thursday 23 March 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -12.9°C
Pressure: 101.5 kPa
Visibility: 6.4 km
Humidity: 87 %
Wind Chill: -18
Dewpoint: -14.6°C

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow. Low minus 16.
entry.summary: Snow ending near midnight then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 16. Wind chill near minus 22. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Wednesday 22 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 22 in the morning and minus 7 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Wednesday 22 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Clear. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 12. Wind chill near minus 18. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Wednesday 22 March 2023
